name: Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 1
name_original: Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 1
description:
Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 1 is an educational puzzle game developed by IE Institute. It came out on 04-04-2013. It was published by Nintendo.
Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 1 is available on Nintendo 3DS.
